for _ in range(int(input())):
 n = int(input())
 a = list(map(int,input().split()))
 ans = a[0]-a[1]
 for i in range(1,n-1):
  m = a[i]-a[i+1]
  if ans > m : ans = m
 print(ans)

for i in range(int(input())):
 n=int(input())
 arr=list(map(int,input().split()))
 ans=arr[0]
 i=0
 while(i<n-1):
  ans=min(ans,arr[i]-arr[i+1])
  i+=1 
 print(ans)
